  • {{ currentUser.username }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../models'; import { UserService } from '../services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-layout-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html' }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private userService: UserService ) {} currentUser: User; ngOnInit() { this.userService.currentUser.subscribe( (userData) => { this.currentUser = userData; } ); } }
